div.ab: zōt ud rāspīg: Šnūman, vid. VrS29.1; zōt: VVrS29.4a-b, vid. Y25.4.

Commentary.ab: VVrS29.4] ms. 4240 attests only Šn. Frauuaṣ̌i.

RecitationInstruction.ab: VVrS29.4b yazamaide nmāńiiā̊ ...] y. OD vīspā̊ frauuašiiō (VVrS30.10) 4240.

Nerangs.ab: sraōšəm aṣ̌īm huraōδəm vərəϑrājanəm frādat̰.gaēϑəm aṣ̌auuanəm aṣ̌ahe ratūm yazamaide ... yeŋ́hē hātąm tā sar guftan ka xšnūman nē srōš bēd ān ī bēd guftan agar ardā fraward bēd čīyōn (VVrS29.3) mazdaδāta aṣ̌a.ciθra yazamaide guft (VVrS29.4) ahurəm mazdąm raēuuaṇtəm xᵛarənaŋᵛhaṇtəm yazamaide aməṣ̌ā spəṇtā huxšaϑrā.huδā̊ŋhō yazamaide aṣ̌āunąm vaŋᵛhīš sūrā̊ spə̄ntā̊ frauuaṣ̌aiiō staōmi zbaiiemi ufiiemi ... vīspā̊ frauuaṣ̌aiiō aṣ̌āunąm yazamaide.

"sraōšəm aṣ̌īm huraōδəm vərəϑrājanəm frādat̰.gaēϑəm aṣ̌auuanəm aṣ̌ahe ratūm yazamaide ... yeŋ́hē hātąm he should say it until the end. If ot is not the šnūman for Srōš, he should say the corresponding one. If it is the one for Ardā Fraward, when they have said (VVrS29.3) mazdaδāta aṣ̌a.ciθra yazamaide, he should say (VVrS29.4) ahurəm mazdąm raēuuaṇtəm xᵛarənaŋᵛhaṇtəm yazamaide aməṣ̌ā spəṇtā huxšaϑrā.huδā̊ŋhō yazamaide aṣ̌āunąm vaŋᵛhīš sūrā̊ spə̄ntā̊ frauuaṣ̌aiiō staōmi zbaiiemi ufiiemi ... (VVrS30.10) vīspā̊ frauuaṣ̌aiiō aṣ̌āunąm yazamaide.

... (VVrS29.3) vīspaca vohu mazdaδāta aṣ̌a.ciθra yazamaide hōm ud urwarām andar hāwan abganišn xšnūman ān ī bēd wizārdan agar xšnūman (VVrS29.4) sraōšəm aṣ̌īm huraōδəm vərəϑrājanəm frādat̰.gaēϑəm aṣ̌auuanəm aṣ̌ahe ratūm yazamaide (VVrS30.11) ϑβąm ātrəm ahurahe mazdā̊ puϑrəm aṣ̌auuanəm aṣ̌ahe ratūm yazamaide ... haδa.zaōϑrəm.

"... (VVrS29.3) vīspaca vohu mazdaδāta aṣ̌a.ciθra yazamaide. He has to throw hōm and urwarām into the hāwan. They should perform the corresponding šnūman. If the šnūman is (the šnūman of Srōš, they should recite) (VVrS29.4) sraōšəm aṣ̌īm huraōδəm vərəϑrājanəm frādat̰.gaēϑəm aṣ̌auuanəm aṣ̌ahe ratūm yazamaide, (then they continue with) (VVrS30.11) ϑβąm ātrəm ahurahe mazdā̊ puϑrəm aṣ̌auuanəm aṣ̌ahe ratūm yazamaide ... haδa.zaōϑrəm ..."
